title: Ep 162: Jane of All Trades with June Diane Raphael
itunes:title: Ep 162: Jane of All Trades with June Diane Raphael
itunes:subtitle: Kate brings in a French pharmacy haul and Doree prepares to see her (newly vaccinated!) parents for the first time in a year. Then, oft-requested guest June Diane Raphael joins them to talk about The Jane Club and the power of community, discovering In...
description:
Kate brings in a French pharmacy haul and Doree prepares to see her (newly vaccinated!) parents for the first time in a year. Then, oft-requested guest June Diane Raphael joins them to talk about The Jane Club and the power of community, discovering Instacart delivers Sephora, and the behind-the-scenes secrets of Hollywood glamor. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

 

This week’s episode is sponsored by:

STRIVECTIN - Learn more at StriVectin.com. Email subscribers receive 15% off their first order.

HELLOFRESH - Go to HelloFresh.com/12FOREVER and use code 12FOREVER for 12 free meals, including free shipping! 

FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.

BROOKLINEN - Go to Brooklinen.com and use promo code FOREVER35 to get $25 off when you spend $100 or more, PLUS free shipping.

JENNI KAYNE - Get 15% off your first order at jennikayne.com when you use code FOREVER35 at checkout.

FLEXFIT - Visit Flexfits.com/forever35 and use code FOREVER35 for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits or 10% off your first Flex Cup




Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
